snippet: Cavan M. Redmond, a senior executive at Pfizer, will become the chief executive of WebMD, which is under pressure to bolster its share price.
abstract: Cavan M. Redmond, a senior executive at Pfizer, will become the chief executive of WebMD, which is under pressure to bolster its share price.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Pfizer Executive to Take the Helm of WebMD
headline.print_headline: Pfizer Executive to Take the Helm of WebMD
